title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button and the label are not on the same line anymore. The close button moves down below the label.
EB: The close button and the label should stay on the same line regardless of the view size. The close button should be located to the far right corner.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the application. 2. Resize the view smaller. 3. Observe that the close button moves down below the label instead of staying on the same line.
